scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:sol
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:sol:fix
scripts.dist_token: truffle-flattener ./contracts/AtlantisToken.sol > AtlantisToken.full.sol && solcjs --bin --abi --optimize AtlantisToken.full.sol && mv AtlantisToken_full_sol_AtlantisToken.bin AtlantisToken.full.bin && mv AtlantisToken_full_sol_AtlantisToken.abi AtlantisToken.full.abi && rm AtlantisToken_full_sol_*
scripts.dist_sale: truffle-flattener ./contracts/AtlantisCrowdsale.sol > AtlantisCrowdsale.full.sol && solcjs --bin --abi --optimize AtlantisCrowdsale.full.sol && mv AtlantisCrowdsale_full_sol_AtlantisCrowdsale.bin AtlantisCrowdsale.full.bin && mv AtlantisCrowdsale_full_sol_AtlantisCrowdsale.abi AtlantisCrowdsale.full.abi && rm AtlantisCrowdsale_full_sol_*
scripts.dist: npm run dist_token && npm run dist_sale
